#  Dot Plot of Top 5 Markers for Each Cluster
```{r}
# Select the top markers for each cluster
top_markers <- rat_merged_subcluster_markers %>%
    group_by(cluster) %>%
    slice_max(n = 5, order_by = avg_log2FC) 
```

```{r}
# Create a dot plot of the selected markers
top_markers_dotplot<- DotPlot(object = aligned_rat_merged_subcluster, features = unique(top_markers$gene))
top_markers_dotplot + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0.5, size = 10))
```
